name: Biwar: Legend Of Dragon Slayer [Pre-Alpha Demo - Version 1])
name_original: Biwar: Legend Of Dragon Slayer [Pre-Alpha Demo - Version 1])
description:
“You curse my mother. I will hunt you down.” Biwar legend of dragon slayer is hack n slash, action-adventure game inspired by folklore with a bit fantasy twist. Player will fight enemies in fantasy world

For more information: Official Website

This game is currently a Pre - Alpha Prototype. Feel welcome to share feedback and bug reports in the Discord to engage directly with the developer! Thankyou
